name: City Sniper Assault
description:
Are you ready to take extreme risk in City Sniper Assault and gun down the enemies behind extreme terror in modern crime city? An ultimate sniper battle between modern sniper survival hero and city criminals is waiting in action packed game of City Sniper Assault. Save crime city from agents, murderers, mafia guys, escaping prisoners, gangster and underworld criminals and be the real super hero.

Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
New sniper rifles and new guns
Deadly missions
Real sound effects
Difficult tasks with a lot of cover
